sentences.en: ...the spatial distribution of black employment and population in South Africa.
sentences.cn: …南非黑人就业和人口的空间分布。

sentences.en: changes taking place in the spatial distribution of the population
sentences.cn: 人口的地域分布所发生的变化

sentences.en: Engineering is both visual and spatial, and it's true that there are relatively few women engineers.
sentences.cn: 干工程既涉及到视觉,又涉及空间能力, 并且在实际上,女工程师相对稀少.

sentences.en: Fluctuations are spatial and temporal in character.
sentences.cn: 这种波动的特点是空间性和瞬时性的.

sentences.en: For a system, Hamiltonian is invariant under any translation of spatial coordinates.
sentences.cn: 对于一体系, 哈密算符在任何空间坐标变换下是不变的.

sentences.en: His manual dexterity and fine spatial skills were wasted on routine tasks.
sentences.cn: 他灵巧的动手能力和杰出的空间识别能力都浪费在日常事务上了。

sentences.en: It includes topics such as spatial frequency filtering, holography.
sentences.cn: 它包括空间频率滤光 、 全息摄影.

sentences.en: It is a spatial location defined by a real or imaginary unidimensional extent.
sentences.cn: 由虚拟的或真实的一维空间所定义的空间区域。

sentences.en: One is also able to see how specific acts are related to a temporal and spatial context.
sentences.cn: 人们也能看出具体行为是如何与时空相关联的。

sentences.en: Spatial and temporal variations in the air movement are desirable for fresh environments.
sentences.cn: 空气运动随空间和瞬时而变化是新鲜环境的要求.

sentences.en: Spatial distribution must also be regarded in the evaluation of competition.
sentences.cn: 在评价竞争时,同样必须注意空间分布.

sentences.en: The procedure is quite unusual as compared with the spatial functions.
sentences.cn: 与空间波函数相比,这个方法太异常了.

sentences.en: Their strengths in memory and spatial skills matched.
sentences.cn: 他们在记忆力和空间技能方面势均力敌。

sentences.en: They also do equally well at programming a computer, which is neither visual nor spatial.
sentences.cn: 妇女在计算机编程方面也无异于男性, 这项工作既不涉及视觉能力也不涉及空间能力.

sentences.en: This might raise serious questions over the spatial distribution of the production.
sentences.cn: 这可能对生产量的空间分布提出严重的问题.

sentences.en: This part of brain judges the spatial relationship between objects.
sentences.cn: 大脑的这部分判断物体间的空间关系.

words.tran_cn: 时空的；存在于时间与空间上的
[数]空间的；存在于空间的；受空间条件限制的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 空间布置，空间排列
空间滤波器；空间频率滤波器
空间格局，空间形态；分布类型，空间模式

trans.tran_cn: 空间的，存在于空间的，受空间条件限制的，占大篇幅的
trans.tran_en: relating to the position, size, shape etc of things
